thread.title: Save 25% on tickets to Grillstock BBQ and Music Festival
thread.title_full: Save 25% on tickets to Grillstock BBQ and Music Festival - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save 25% on tickets to Grillstock BBQ and Music Festival
text: Grillstock, the UK’s best BBQ and music festival will bring a fantastic weekend of Meat, Music and Mayhem to the nation’s capital for the first time, in Walthamstow on the 5th and 6th September. Festival goers can expect two days of BBQ and street food, the chance to watch committed BBQ teams compete to be King of the Grill, and foot stomping music headlined by US legends, Fun Lovin’ Criminals, Cuban Bros, Hayseed Dixie, DJ Yoda, Grandmaster Flash and Razorlight. With two sell-out events in Bristol and Manchester already under their belt, organisers are ready to bring the biggest BBQ festival outside of the US to London, with 40,000 fans expected to attend over the weekend. How to Claim To claim a 25% discount on all ticket types for Grillstock London, click here telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
